content: Yes, if you have rustup installed and in your PATH, rustc points to the rustup wrapper that picks the right rustc toolchain.
How to get verbose logging from RA?
For server side logging set RA_LOG=info. For logging the communication between rust-analyzer and vscode, set "rust-analyzer.trace.server": "verbose in your vscode config.
Is there any plan to support -Z patch-in-config (https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/9269)?
it should work automatically (but we don't pass feature flags to cargo)
